data.message: Geometric circle compositions work when applying FORMULAS not intuition: 1) Golden ratio sizing (1.0 : 0.62 : 0.38), 2) 40-45% overlap between adjacent circles, 3) Diagonal cascade with larger circles lower/left and smaller circles upper/right, 4) Text positioned at ~35-40% from left, emerging from cluster not competing. The Mastercard principle: "The intersection is where meaning lives" - overlap areas should be visible and purposeful.
